name: Hungry Hungry Dragon
description: You play as a dragon and he is hungry for dragon fruits. The more dragon fruits he eats the more he grows. Keep eating to get a high score. Be careful of the spike balls, one hit and its game over. The controls are W-Up, A-Left, S-Down, D-Right. The game also supports mouse controls by just clicking the arrows. Mobile support is also included if you want to play on phones or tablets.
